name: Socky's Puppet Show! Ep. 2
description:
Socky is back!
Last episode you were an investigative journalist looking for clues about a murder case in the abandoned studio for Socky’s Puppet Show! As you were leaving, Socky appeared, and you were knocked out. When you woke up, you were on the set of the show with Socky nowhere to be found. Now you must solve strange puzzles and try and escape, or else…
_____________________________________________________________________________________
In this episode of Socky’s Puppet Show! you’re trapped on set and must solve puzzles to escape. To aid you, there are old VHS tapes of the Socky! TV show. Watch out though, not everything is as it seems…_____________________________________________________________________________________Claim your free copy at the bottom ⬇⬇⬇ _____________________________________________________________________________________
Features: - Atmospheric environment
- Scarier than ep. 1 - Lots of creative puzzles - Socky! - Live-action episodes of Socky’s Puppet Show! for you to watch - About 15-30 minutes of playtime  - Secrets! (Of course)

***NOTE*** Lockboxes are not imperative to finishing :)

_____________________________________________________________________________________
Thank you for playing! We hope you enjoy, please let us of know of any bugs so we can fix them and make sure to follow us for updates on the next and final episode!

_____________________________________________________________________________________

With your purchase, you will receive: - Socky’s Puppet Show! Game: Episodes 1 + 2 - The live action show (excluding secret tapes) - Some original art
Thank you for playing! Hope you enjoy :D
Credits: Jayson Ng Zon Guan - Composer
Luke Smith - Programmer, Level Designer, Literally Everything Brendan Smith - Playtester

***NOTE 2*** Episodes and art are for buyer use only, you do NOT have permission to sell them.


First 50 copies are FREE!
